comments.body: Maybe just `You can write ... to overcome this problem` to avoid terminology change about implicits.
I will support this pattern soon. The error message will be removed then.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +262,266 @@            """Macros using a return type of the form `foo(): given X => Y` are not yet supported.
              |
              |Place the implicit as an argument (`foo() given X: Y`) to overcome this limitation.
              |""".stripMargin, tree.sourcePos)
        case _ =>
